00024       private static bool opt_dot = false;
00025       private static bool opt_nochecker = false;
00026       private static bool wait = false;
00027       private static List<string> refs = new List<string>() { "mscorlib" };

00029       private static List<string> filenames = new List<string>();

00061       private static void PrintHelp()
00062       {
00063          Console.Error.WriteLine("Valid options:");
00064          Console.Error.WriteLine("\t--ast\t\tPrint the abstract syntax tree");
00065          Console.Error.WriteLine("\t--dot\t\tGenerate a Graphviz file for the AST");
00066          Console.Error.WriteLine("\t--nochecker\tDisable the checker");
00067          Console.Error.WriteLine("\t--nogenerator\tDisable the code generator");
00068          Console.Error.WriteLine("\t--ref:\tReference other assemblies");
00069          Console.Error.WriteLine("\t--out:\tOutput file");   
00070       }
00071 
00076       private static void ParseOptions(String[] args)
00077       {
00078          Type t = typeof(string[]);
00079          if (args.Length == 0)
00080          {
00081             Console.Error.WriteLine("Error: no options specified");
00082             PrintHelp();
00083             Environment.Exit(1);
00084             
00085             //filenames.Add("ex1.vnvd");
00086             //refs.Add("System");
00087             //refs.Add("System.Windows.Forms");
00088             //refs.Add("System.Drawing");
00089             //output = "MyAsm.exe";
00090             //opt_ast = true;
00093             //wait = true;
00095          }
00096          else
00097          {
00098             for (int i = 0; i < args.Length; i++)
00099             {
00100                if (args[i].Equals("--ast"))
00101                {
00102                   opt_ast = true;
00103                }
00104                else if (args[i].Equals("--dot"))
00105                {
00106                   opt_dot = true;
00107                }
00108                else if (args[i].Equals("--nochecker"))
00109                {
00110                   opt_nochecker = true;
00111                }
00112                else if (args[i].Equals("--nogenerator"))
00113                {
00114                   opt_nogenerator = true;
00115                }
00116                else if (args[i].StartsWith("--ref:"))
00117                {
00118                   refs.Add(args[i].Substring(6, args[i].Length - 6));
00119                }
00120                else if (args[i].StartsWith("--out:"))
00121                {
00122                   output = args[i].Substring(6, args[i].Length - 6);
00123                }
00124                else if (args[i].Equals("--van"))
00125                {
00126                   Console.WriteLine("Nee");
00127                   Environment.Exit(0);
00128                }
00129                else if (!args[i].StartsWith("--"))
00130                {
00131                   filenames.Add(args[i]);
00132                }
00133                else
00134                {
00135                   Console.Error.WriteLine("Error: unknown option '" + args[i] + "'");
00136                   PrintHelp();
00137                   Environment.Exit(1);
00138                }
00139             }
00140             if (filenames.Count == 0)
00141             {
00142                Console.Error.WriteLine("Error: no files to compile specified.");
00143                Environment.Exit(1);
00144             }
00145             if (output == String.Empty)
00146             {
00147                int ext = filenames[0].LastIndexOf(".");
00148                output = (ext != -1 ? filenames[0].Substring(0, ext) : filenames[0]) + ".exe";
00149 
00150                int slash = output.LastIndexOf("/");
00151                int backslash = output.LastIndexOf("\\");
00152 
00153                output = (slash != -1 ? output.Substring(slash + 1) : output);
00154                output = (backslash != -1 ? output.Substring(backslash + 1) : output);
00155             }
00156          }
00157 
00158          foreach (string filename in filenames)
00159          {
00160             if (!File.Exists(filename))
00161             {
00162                Console.Error.WriteLine("Error: File doesn't exist '" + filename + "'");
00163 
00164                Environment.Exit(1);
00165             }
00166          }
00167       }
00168 
00173       public static void Main(String[] args)
00174       {
00175          Console.Out.WriteLine("Vnvd Compiler v" + Assembly.GetExecutingAssembly().GetName().Version);
00176          Console.Out.WriteLine("====================");
00177          Console.Out.WriteLine();
00178          ParseOptions(args);
00179          lib = new LibraryChecker(refs.ToArray());
00180          List<TreeNode> trees = new List<TreeNode>();
00181          bool error = false;
00182 
00183          foreach (String filename in filenames)
00184          {
00185             VnvdLexer lexer = new VnvdLexer(new ANTLRFileStream(filename));
00186 
00187             CommonTokenStream tokens = new CommonTokenStream(lexer);
00188             VnvdParser parser = new VnvdParser(tokens);
00189             parser.TreeAdaptor = new TreeNodeAdaptor();
00190 
00191             VnvdParser.program_return result = parser.program();
00192             TreeNode tree = (TreeNode) result.Tree;
00193             trees.Add(tree);
00194 
00195             if (parser.NumberOfSyntaxErrors > 0)
00196                error = true;
00197          }
00198 
00199          if (!error)
00200          {
00201             VnvdChecker checker = null;
00202             if (!opt_nochecker)
00203             {
00204                // check the AST
00205                CheckerManual manual = new CheckerManual();
00206                try
00207                {
00208                   foreach (TreeNode tree in trees)
00209                   {
00210                      manual.WalkClasses(tree);
00211                   }
00212                   manual.WalkClassExtendation();
00213                   manual.WalkClassMembers();
00214 
00215                   for (int i = 0; i < trees.Count; i++)
00216                   {
00217                      TreeNode tree = trees[i];
00218                      ITreeNodeStream nodes = new CommonTreeNodeStream(tree);
00219                      checker = new VnvdChecker(nodes);
00220                      checker.Filename = filenames[i];
00221 
00222                      checker.program();
00223                      if (checker.SemanticErrorCount > 0 || checker.NumberOfSyntaxErrors > 0)
00224                         error = true;
00225                   }
00226                }
00227                catch (CheckerException ex)
00228                {
00229                   Console.WriteLine(ex.ToString());
00230                   error = true;
00231                }
00232             }
00233 
00234             if (!error)
00235             {
00236                if (!opt_nogenerator)
00237                {
00238                   AssemblyName aName = new AssemblyName();
00239                   aName.Name = Vnvd.OutputFile.Substring(0, Vnvd.OutputFile.LastIndexOf('.'));
00240 
00241                   AssemblyBuilder ab =
00242                      AppDomain.CurrentDomain.DefineDynamicAssembly(
00243                          aName,
00244                          AssemblyBuilderAccess.Save);
00245 
00246                   // For a single-module assembly, the module name is usually
00247                   // the assembly name plus an extension.
00248                   mb =
00249                       ab.DefineDynamicModule(aName.Name, Vnvd.OutputFile);
00250                   GeneratorManual manualWalker = new GeneratorManual(mb, ab);
00251 
00252                   foreach (TreeNode tree in trees)
00253                   {
00254                      manualWalker.WalkTypes(tree);
00255                   }
00256                   manualWalker.WalkTypeMembers();
00257 
00258                   foreach (TreeNode tree in trees)
00259                   {
00260                      ITreeNodeStream nodes = new CommonTreeNodeStream(tree);
00261                      VnvdGenerator generator = new VnvdGenerator(nodes);
00262                      generator.program();
00263                   }
00264 
00265                   foreach (TypeBuilder t in manualWalker.AllTypes)
00266                   {
00267                      t.CreateType();
00268                   }
00269 
00270                   try
00271                   {
00272                      ab.Save(OutputFile);
00273                   }
00274                   catch (IOException)
00275                   {
00276                      Console.WriteLine("Error while saving the assembly. The output file is in use.");
00277                   }
00278                }
00279             }
00280 
00281             if (opt_ast)
00282             {
00283                // print the AST as string
00284                StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
00285 
00286                foreach (TreeNode tree in trees)
00287                {
00288                   String s = tree.ToStringTree();
00289                   int indent = 0;
00290                   foreach (char c in s)
00291                   {
00292                      if (c == '(')
00293                      {
00294                         sb.Append('\n');
00295                         indent += 3;
00296                         for (int i = 0; i < indent; i++)
00297                            sb.Append(' ');
00298                      }
00299                      else if (c == ')')
00300                      {
00301                         indent -= 3;
00302                      }
00303                      sb.Append(c);
00304                   }
00305 
00306                   sb.AppendLine();
00307                   sb.AppendLine();
00308                }
00309               
00310 
00311                //Console.WriteLine(sb.ToString());
00312                Console.WriteLine("AST was written to ast.txt");
00313                StreamWriter sw = new StreamWriter("ast.txt");
00314                sw.Write(sb.ToString());
00315                sw.Close();
00316             }
00317             else if (opt_dot)
00318             {
00319                // print the AST as DOT specification
00320                DOTTreeGenerator gen = new DOTTreeGenerator();
00321 
00322                Console.WriteLine("Graphviz AST graph (only first tree) was written to ast.dot");
00323                StringTemplate st = gen.ToDOT(trees[0]);
00324                StreamWriter sw = new StreamWriter("ast.dot");
00325                sw.Write(st.ToString());
00326                sw.Close();
00327             }
00328          }
00329 
00330          if (wait)
00331             Console.Read();
00332       }
00333    }
